title: Climbing outta bronze (Support Main)
body:
To nervous to play on my own, to eager to stay in Bronze
Support main
Bard, Braum and Nami main
can play any Support besides Blitz, Sona, Lux and Leo bc i don't own
Skype prefered
Hit me up if interested Windking27

replies.body: Hot tip, if you want to climb out of bronze don't main support. I did it and it was a nightmare and made the grind SO much harder. Play a carry role or something where you can snowball. Not saying support can't influence a game, it's just 10x harder.
